name: 18mm Tokina Cinema Vista Prime Lens T1.5
text: Super High-Speed Cine Lens with more than Full Frame coverage, PL-Mount.
description: Tokina 18mm T1.5 Cinema Vista Prime Lens with a PL mount provides an image circle that more than covers full-frame sensors and is designed to provide sharp images even when recording images at 8K resolution
includes: 1 x 18mm Tokina Visita Cinema Prime Lens T1.5 FF, PL-Mount
